SELECT b.b_seq, b_title, b_comment, b_regdate, b_writer, b_topYN, b_modifier, b_modifydate FROM board b, showlist s WHERE b.b_seq = s.b_seq AND s.u_id = #{u_id} AND b_topYN = 'Y'
